caption.p: Contact angle measurements of (1) PDMS, (2) the two different geo-material PDMS chips, and (3) their respective rocks without PVA (−PVA) and with PVA (+PVA). The colours of the points correspond to the different materials present. PDMS is shown as black, geo-material PDMS is red, rock slices are blue and Cassie’s equation estimates for the geo-material PDMS is yellow.
